abstract_summ: The severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) has spread worldwide . Cardiovascular risk factors and chronic cardiovascular conditions are prevalent among patients affected by COVID-19 and associated with adverse outcomes .
